meanings.definition: To defeat or outdo by using a trump card.
meanings.sent1: In the game, he overtrumped his opponent with a powerful card.
meanings.sent2: She overtrumped her rival by playing the winning move.
meanings.sent3: The magician overtrumped his assistant with a surprising trick.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter overtrumped the silence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm overtrumped the sound of the falling raindrops.

meanings.definition: To surpass or exceed in importance or significance.
meanings.sent1: His achievement overtrumped all others in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset overtrumped the view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's cuteness overtrumped the mess it made in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness overtrumped any material possessions.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's passion for learning overtrumped any obstacles in her way.

meanings.sent1: The bright stars overtrumped the dim moon in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her talent overtrumped the rest of the performers on stage.
meanings.sent3: The colorful flowers overtrumped the plain green grass in the garden.
meanings.sent4: His charisma overtrumped his lack of experience in the role.
meanings.sent5: The grand fireworks display overtrumped all other attractions at the fair.
